references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of probabilistic forecasting, which is the core topic of the current research.

references.paper_title: Deep learning for time series forecasting: Tutorial and literature survey
references.reason: This survey paper provides a thorough review of deep learning methods for time series forecasting, which are relevant to the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: High-dimensional multivariate forecasting with low-rank gaussian copula processes
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for multivariate time series forecasting using Gaussian processes, which is closely related to the current work's model.

references.paper_title: DeepAR: Probabilistic forecasting with autoregressive recurrent networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the DeepAR model, which is a foundation for many multivariate probabilistic time series forecasting models and is used as a baseline in this work.
This book provides a foundational understanding of time series forecasting, which is highly relevant to the current paper's methodology and context.
